item.launchable

Class LaunchableItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • item.Item
      • item.launchable.LaunchableItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VisitableItem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IdentityDisc

    public abstract class LaunchableItem
extends Item
    This is a special type of items which can be launched by the player. For example an IdentityDisc.
    Author:
    Dieter

      • isValidTravelDirection

        public static boolean isValidTravelDirection(Direction travelDirection)
        Check whether the given travelDirection is a valid travelDirection for all the Launchable objects.
        Parameters:
        travelDirection - The travelDirection to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given value is not null and doesn't represent a diagonal direction
